Thu, Jul 9, 2015, 13:26 BST - UK Markets close in 3 hrs 4 mins SYSPRO a Winner in Two “Hot” Categories at Network Products Guide 2015 IT World Awards SYSPRO is Gold Winner in “Hot Companies” Category; Bronze Winner in “Hot Technologies” Category Press Release : SYSPRO – 8 minutes ago Related Content 
COSTA MESA, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
SYSPRO , a provider of best-of-breed, award-winning enterprise resource planning (ERP) software for on-premise, mobile and cloud-based utilization, today announced that SYSPRO has been named a “Gold Winner” in the category, “Hot Companies – 500+ Employees,” and a Bronze Winner in the category, “Hot Technologies - 500 + Employees,” by Network Products Guide, the industry’s leading technology research and advisory guide. 
The Network Products Guide industry and peer awards, which were presented in San Francisco on June 29, 2015, are the world’s premier information technology awards honoring achievements and recognitions in every facet of the IT industry. 
SYSPRO was chosen a “hot company” for the company’s leading-edge ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) software for manufacturers and distributors, the highly rated SYSPRO award-winning implementation methodology, leading customer service and high customer retention rates. 
The SYSPRO win in the “Hot Technologies Category” recognizes the leading edge technology incorporated in the SYSPRO mobile solution, SYSPRO Espresso , one of the first introduced by an ERP provider. SYSPRO Espresso is device agnostic, while the Espresso underlying leading architecture enables full customization by the user to adjust how the user interface (UI) behaves, as well as by the developer through the use of components (building blocks) to add business functionality in the back-end on the server. The SYSPRO Espresso architecture is also one of the first platforms of its kind to use a single source codebase (for the business logic) to create native applications for any mobile device. 
Joey Benadretti, President of SYSPRO USA, commenting on the new honors, notes, “These awards show the emphasis that SYSPRO places on being a leading software provider. They also exemplify the company’s ongoing dedication to leverage and optimize technologies that enable manufacturers and distributors in a host of vertical market segments to maximize their utilization of SYSPRO ERP to achieve operational efficiencies, lean practices, outstanding customer service and revenue and profits growth.” 
About Network Products Guide Awards 
As industry’s leading technology research and advisory publication, Network Products Guide plays a vital role in keeping decision makers and end-users informed of the choices in all areas of information technology. The Guide features a wealth of information on the best products and services, roadmaps, industry directions, technology advancements and independent product evaluations that facilitate in making the most pertinent technology decisions impacting business and personal goals. For more information, go to: www.networkproductsguide.com 
About SYSPRO 
SYSPRO, the leading Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) platform for manufacturers and distributors, provides companies with all the software needed to leverage their business – on premise, in the cloud, from a mobile device. From single-location companies to multi-national corporations, SYSPRO provides the functionality to connect the entire supply chain and operate more efficiently. With more than 15,000 customers in 60 countries and one of highest customer retention rates in the industry, SYSPRO is focused on meeting both the current and future needs of its user base. The SYSPRO commitment to ongoing cutting edge technology and an exceptional feature-rich product provide the lowest risk for customers purchasing ERP software solutions. For more information, visit www.SYSPRO.com .
